snippet: Central bankers and finance ministers gathering in Washington for meetings of the World Bank and I.M.F. point to the global implications of the government shutdown and a possible default.
lead_paragraph: Central bankers and finance ministers gathering in Washington for meetings of the World Bank and I.M.F. point to the global implications of the government shutdown and a possible default.

headline.main: World Leaders Urge U.S. to End Its Debt Impasse
